item.title: Just in time knowledge - Niall Bunting

However, I kept postponing it as I was growing fond of Hugo and didn‚Äôt want to invest any content (or money) on WordPress anymore. The good thing is that I‚Äôve finally found the courage to transition to this slick and fast site you‚Äôre browsing now!

item.title: Fraunhofer Heinrich Hertz Institute HHI
item.description: Through a reduction of data requirements, H.266/VVC makes video transmission in mobile networks (where data capacity is limited) more efficient. For instance, the previous standard H.265/HEVC requires ca. 10 gigabytes of data to transmit a 90-min UHD video. With this new technology, only 5 gigabytes of data are required to achieve the same quality. Because H.266/VVC was developed with ultra-high-resolution video content in mind, the new standard is particularly beneficial when streaming 4K or 8K videos on a flat screen TV. Furthermore, H.266/VVC is ideal for all types of moving images: from high-resolution 360¬∞ video panoramas to screen sharing contents.

Castle Game Engine
item.description: Free open-source 3D and 2D game engine with an excellent support for many formats (X3D, VRML, Spine...). Cross-platform: desktop, mobile (Android, iOS), web plugin.
